landing.ogTitle: Flipika — Automated Instagram Ads Reporting in 2 minutes
landing.ogDescription: Analyze your Instagram Ads campaigns effortlessly. Flipika generates clear reports on your Stories, Reels, and Feed Ads for your clients.

hero.badge: Instagram Ads Integration via Meta API
hero.title: Your Instagram Ads reports, ready in 2 minutes.
hero.subtitle: Stories, Reels, Feed and Shopping Ads — analyze every Instagram placement and present results to your clients in beautiful automated slides.

features.title: Instagram Ads reporting built for modern agencies
features.subtitle: The metrics that actually matter for Social Ads.

card1.title: Performance by Placement
card1.description: Compare results across Stories, Reels, Feed and Instagram Shopping to identify the most profitable formats for each client.

card2.title: Engagement & Click Rates
card2.description: CTR, engagement rate, interactions — visualize how your audience responds to your Instagram Ads content with clear charts.

card3.title: Creatives & Visuals Embedded
card3.description: Flipika automatically imports your Instagram creatives from Business Manager and displays them in the report to contextualize performance.

workflow.title: How to automatically create your Instagram Ads reports?
workflow.subtitle: 3 steps to impress your clients with visual, professional reports.

step1.title: Connect Instagram via Meta
step1.description: Link your Meta ad account to import all your Instagram Ads data in real time.

step2.title: Generate in one click
step2.description: Choose the right Instagram Ads template and Flipika fills in all the data automatically.

step3.title: Share in style
step3.description: Send a white-label PDF or interactive live link to your client — no coding required.

faq.title: Frequently asked questions about Instagram Ads reporting

items.question: Does Flipika support Instagram Stories and Reels placements?
items.answer: Yes. Flipika breaks down performance by Meta placement: Instagram Feed, Stories, Reels, and Instagram Shopping. You can filter and compare each format in your report.

items.question: Are Instagram engagement metrics available?
items.answer: Yes. Flipika imports engagement rate, interactions (likes, comments, shares), reach, and frequency directly from the Meta API for your Instagram Ads campaigns.

items.question: Can I include my Instagram creatives in the report?
items.answer: Absolutely. Flipika automatically fetches images and videos from your Instagram ads via Business Manager and displays them in slides for a visually impactful presentation.

items.question: Is the Instagram Ads report white-label?
items.answer: Yes. Customize with your logo, colors and agency name. The report will be 100% your brand.

items.question: How do I separate Facebook and Instagram data?
items.answer: Flipika automatically segments performance by network. Create a report dedicated only to Instagram placements, or combine Facebook and Instagram into a single multi-platform report.

closingCta.title: Impress your clients with visual Instagram Ads reports
closingCta.subtitle: Stories, Reels, Feed — all in one automated report.
